activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9143
activity.text:
> As per FHIR Spec, any string can be used as a patient name, some countries allow names with numbers to exist legally, we cannot create this validation. [@rithviknishad](https://github.com/rithviknishad) close this issue and all related issues.

Thank you @vigneshhari for the clarification. Got to know a new thing.
